entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Oromocto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 09:33 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or freezing rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
